alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clay; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 2:22PM CST until February 17 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Northern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 300 PM CST. * At 221 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Reform, or 17 miles west of Starkville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Starkville and Longview around 235 PM CST. Muldrow around 250 PM CST. Tibbee around 255 PM CST. West Point around 300 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
